description: Try our easy to follow Prawns & Brown Rice Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawns & Brown Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 carrot, halved and thinly sliced diagonally
3 cm piece ginger, peeled and finely grated
100g snow peas, trimmed, cut into strips

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice, following absorption method on packet, until tender. Transfer to a large bowl.
Combine carrot, shallots, snow peas and corn with rice and toss well.
Whisk soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic and ginger in a jug until well combined.
Pour dressing over salad. Toss gently to combine.
Divide between serving bowls and top with prawns, cashews and coriander before serving.
